name: Casual Ball
description:
Casual Ball is a game where you control a ball by rotating or touching the screen to escape enemies and get points.

This game has 3 controllers, they can be selected in the Options menu.

The default language is Portuguese, but you can change by clicking in the USA icon in the main menu.

This game have:

  • 3 difficulties
  • 1 extra mode.
  • 2 power ups.
  • 3 controller types. (Accelerometer is in development)
  • 2 languages, Portuguese and English.
  • A shop to buy upgrades, colors and game modes.

Still receiving updates.
